greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle of coefficients in expansion of (1+7x)^n.
comment: T(n,k) equals the number of n-length words on {0,1,...,7} having n-k zeros. - _Milan Janjic_, Jul 24 2015
formula: T(n,k) = 7^k*C(n,k) = Sum_{i=n-k..n} C(i,n-k)*C(n,i)*6^(n-i). Row sums are 8^n = A001018. - _Mircea Merca_, Apr 28 2012
mathematica: Table[T[n, k], {n, 0, 10}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, May 23 2016 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
